description.raw:
The new packages server has a different reprepro 'tag' \(an identifier used by apt repos\) than `packages.osrfoundation.org`. If we switch the DNS to point to the new machine apt is failing complaining about the change of the tag and requires all users to use `--allow-releaseinfo-chang` flag when running apt-get update.

To avoid this I’m going to change all the tags in the new packages server before we change the DNS. That will require us to run `--allow-releaseinfo-change `for the docker images that reuse the docker cache.
